Package Server.game.player.computerPlayer

Class ComputerPlayer

java.lang.Object
Server.game.player.Player
Server.game.player.computerPlayer.ComputerPlayer
public class ComputerPlayer extends Player
Represents a computer-controlled player in the game. Handles automatic ship placement and shooting logic using ComputerShootingManager.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ComputerPlayer(int mapSize, ShipsConfiguration shipsConfiguration)
    Constructs a computer player with the specified map size and ship configuration.
